greetings.1347008139: It is good to see you.

greetings.627910712: What can I do for you?
greetings.179356406: That expedition is counting on us.

farewells.3556123943: Hope you make it back in one piece.
farewells.2161660330: I'll save a pint for you if you want it.

greetings.4118661068: I'm grabbin' a pint when this blows over.
greetings.2887202607: I just wanna get back to the mainland.

pissed.173670572: Ugh, today is just not my day, is it?
pissed.1741104732: Do you really have to keep doin' that?!
pissed.416343342: Ya know what? You win. Poke away.

greetings.1679731119: An alert mind is a strong mind.

farewells.703704796: Keep your guard up. Lives depend on us.

greetings.1106466630: We've been through a lot together.
greetings.2939275534: Ogres and necromancy. A dangerous combination.
greetings.1843484044: We can't rest until we stop the ritual.
greetings.464896406: The alliance leaves no one behind.
greetings.3134555136: Together, we'll see our way through this.
greetings.2197125912: We have a mission to accomplish.

pissed.213167332: Good job. You figured out how to really irritate me.
pissed.1363660859: Need something, recruit. Maybe a giant hammer to the face.
pissed.4202015988: I remember when I was a freshfaced recruit, I was just like you. And then I grew up.

greetings.2858631946: You need it, I got it.

pissed.3661835860: Hey, hey! Quit it, will ya?
pissed.845209570: Did you see I'm in the middle of scheming?
pissed.3073804549: We goblins know a thing or two about explosives... Care for a demonstration?

greetings.2482400314: The horde leaves no one behind.

pissed.2665597646: You're starting to get on my nerves.
pissed.847800927: Don't you have more work to do?
pissed.3264367485: Maybe I should poke you back with a spear.

farewells.3355635158: Remain calm in the face of danger.

greetings.189751089: I wonder if this island will kill me... again.
greetings.3072177903: Never a dull moment with the Horde.

pissed.2291509826: Quit it! Unless you wanna be dead, too!

farewells.4182735933: Take it easy and always take samples.
farewells.4083505510: Let me know how it goes.

greetings.1245981129: There's no problem that engineering can't solve.
greetings.4146089359: It's good to be back in Stormwind.
greetings.637696747: Necromance is nothing next to technology.
greetings.1740495846: Nothing compares to the power of science.
greetings.3060480702: We'll show these ogres the power of science.

pissed.546780793: Are you kidding me with this?
pissed.1990199600: I'm trying to brainstorm. I bet I could automate what you're doing right now. Want to test it out?

farewells.1038100891: Remember the day you meet me

greetings.3455810228: Of course, you come to me for aid.

greetings.54840189: I'm here to help however I can.
greetings.2048500673: I bet we'll save the expedition in no time.

pissed.4021033133: Is this what superior officers do all day?
pissed.2131046371: Okay, I think that's enough poking practice. Maybe take a break.
pissed.2934815903: Oh, I'll remember this next time we spar.

greetings.3241600799: The horde has endured worse than this.
greetings.1400198972: We won't rest until the expedition has been found.
greetings.1994809588: Together, we can put an end to these rituals.
greetings.2482400314: The Horde leaves no one behind.
greetings.2867614923: These Ogres will cower before the horde.

pissed.2535468540: Are you trying to lose that finger, Recruit?
pissed.797003410: Keep it up, and I'll show you why they call me Grimaxe.
pissed.4099890119: I was just like you once before I got some sense knocked into me.

farewells.2463566961: The survivors be countin' on us.

greetings.536175265: We've got to get de others back.
greetings.454124938: There be bad mojo on this island.
